title-part.text: COMPUTING ARRANGEMENTS BASED ON SPECIFIC COMPUTATIONAL MODELS

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Computing arrangements based on biological models

CPC-specific-text.text: Biomolecular computers, i.e. using biomolecules, proteins, cells

reference.text: using DNA G06N3/123; using neurons G06N3/061

title-part.text: Artificial life, i.e. computing arrangements simulating life
based on simulated virtual individual or collective life forms, e.g. social simulations or particle swarm optimisation [PSO]
based on physical entities controlled by simulated intelligence so as to replicate intelligent life forms, e.g. based on robots replicating pets or humans in their appearance or behaviour

note.note-paragraph:
Group G06N3/04 is impacted by reclassification into groups G06N3/0464, G06N3/0475, G06N3/0495 and G06N3/0499.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: based on fuzzy logic, fuzzy membership or fuzzy inference, e.g. adaptive neuro-fuzzy inference systems [ANFIS]

note.note-paragraph:
Group G06N3/044 is impacted by reclassification into group G06N3/0442.
Groups G06N3/044 and G06N3/0442 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: characterised by memory or gating, e.g. long short-term memory [LSTM] or gated recurrent units [GRU]

note.note-paragraph:
Group G06N3/0442 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N3/044.
Groups G06N3/044 and G06N3/0442 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G06N3/045 is impacted by reclassification into group G06N3/0455.
Groups G06N3/045 and G06N3/0455 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G06N3/0455 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N3/045.
Groups G06N3/045 and G06N3/0455 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G06N3/0464 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N3/04.
Groups G06N3/04 and G06N3/0464 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G06N3/047 is impacted by reclassification into group G06N3/0475.
Groups G06N3/047 and G06N3/0475 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G06N3/0475 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups G06N3/04 and G06N3/047.
Groups G06N3/04, G06N3/047, and G06N3/0475 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Temporal neural networks, e.g. delay elements, oscillating neurons or pulsed inputs

note.note-paragraph:
Group G06N3/0495 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N3/04.
Groups G06N3/04 and G06N3/0495 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G06N3/0499 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N3/04.
Groups G06N3/04 and G06N3/0499 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Physical realisation, i.e. hardware implementation of neural networks, neurons or parts of neurons

CPC-specific-text.text: using biological neurons, e.g. biological neurons connected to an integrated circuit
using electro-optical, acousto-optical or opto-electronic means

note.note-paragraph:
Group G06N3/08 is impacted by reclassification into groups G06N3/0895, G06N3/09, G06N3/091, G06N3/092, G06N3/094, G06N3/096, G06N3/098 and G06N3/0985.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: modifying the architecture, e.g. adding, deleting or silencing nodes or connections
using evolutionary algorithms, e.g. genetic algorithms or genetic programming
Weakly supervised learning, e.g. semi-supervised or self-supervised learning

note.note-paragraph:
Group G06N3/0895 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N3/08.
Groups G06N3/08 and G06N3/0895 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G06N3/09 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N3/08.
Groups G06N3/08 and G06N3/09 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Groups G06N3/08 and G06N3/094 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G06N3/0985 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N3/08.

title-part.text: Interfaces, programming languages or software development kits, e.g. for simulating neural networks
Evolutionary algorithms, e.g. genetic algorithms or genetic programming
Computing arrangements based on specific mathematical models
Probabilistic graphical models, e.g. probabilistic networks

reference.text: computing arrangements based on biological models G06N3/00; computing arrangements using knowledge-based models G06N5/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Learning or tuning the parameters of a fuzzy system
Development tools for entering the parameters of a fuzzy system
Implementation by means of a neural network

reference.text: neural networks using fuzzy logic G06N3/043

title-part.text: using chaos models or non-linear system models
Quantum computing, i.e. information processing based on quantum-mechanical phenomena

note.note-paragraph:
Group G06N10/00 is impacted by reclassification into groups G06N10/20, G06N10/40, G06N10/60, G06N10/70 and G06N10/80.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Models of quantum computing, e.g. quantum circuits or universal quantum computers

note.note-paragraph:
Group G06N10/20 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N10/00.
Groups G06N10/00 and G06N10/20 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Physical realisations or architectures of quantum processors or components for manipulating qubits, e.g. qubit coupling or qubit control

note.note-paragraph:
Group G06N10/40 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N10/00.
Groups G06N10/00 and G06N10/40 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Quantum algorithms, e.g. based on quantum optimisation, quantum Fourier or Hadamard transforms

note.note-paragraph:
Group G06N10/60 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N10/00.
Groups G06N10/00 and G06N10/60 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Quantum error correction, detection or prevention, e.g. surface codes or magic state distillation

note.note-paragraph:
Group G06N10/70 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N10/00.
Groups G06N10/00 and G06N10/70 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Quantum programming, e.g. interfaces, languages or software-development kits for creating or handling programs capable of running on quantum computers
Platforms for simulating or accessing quantum computers, e.g. cloud-based quantum computing

note.note-paragraph:
Group G06N10/80 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G06N10/00.
Groups G06N10/00 and G06N10/80 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: using kernel methods, e.g. support vector machines [SVM]
Subject matter not provided for in other groups of this subclass

CPC-specific-text.text: Molecular computers, i.e. using inorganic molecules
